metadata.Title: CVE-2021-1495 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Multiple Cisco products are affected by a vulnerability in the Snortdetection engine that could allow an unauthenticated, remote attacker tobypass a configured file policy for HTTP. The vulnerability is due toincorrect handling of specific HTTP header parameters. An attacker couldexploit this vulnerability by sending crafted HTTP packets through anaffected device. A successful exploit could allow the attacker to bypass aconfigured file policy for HTTP packets and deliver a malicious payload.

criterions.comment: snort: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
